== Introduction ==
Welcome!  This is the home page of the '''Nebraska Ubuntu Local Community Team'''  (<nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/people/nebraskateam|Launchpad Page]]</nowiki>)
We are advocates for the use of Ubuntu Linux in homes, schools, businesses, and governments throughout the state of Nebraska and Western Iowa.  
== Contact ==

=== How to Join Us! ===
* You can sign up for our mailing list at https://lists.ubuntu.com/mailman/listinfo/ubuntu-us-ne

* You can join our Launchpad team at (<nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/people/nebraskateam|The Nebraska Team Page]]</nowiki>)

== How to Contribute ==
As of April, 2009, the Nebraska team is getting re-started.  We've got lots of opportunities for people to contribute: 
* Teaching
* Installation
* Local "Hands On" Support
* Evangelizing 

== Projects ==
* See our <nowiki>[[NebraskaTeam-Projects]]</nowiki> projects page.
* Look for opportunities to do presentations about Ubuntu
* Look for a chance to help with a BarCamp in the Omaha area
* Setup presentation of Ubuntu and how it can help an organization

== Meetings ==
